title: Meditative Ambient Music
description: 15 Tracks of Meditative Ambient Music.  The guitar melodies, in perfect harmony with the gentle cello chords and the subtle ambience of synthesizers, create a unique and deeply relaxing experience.
longDescription:
Preview the full album here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MoCGUtmpHtg


This is an asset inspired by the mesmerizing sounds of Estas Tonne and the captivating world of games like Journey.


🌟 What the Music Asset Offers 🌟


🔮 Immersive Soundscapes: Dive into mesmerizing, emotionally charged soundscapes that breathe life into your game's narrative.


🌌 Inspirational Compositions: Each track is a journey in itself, crafted to evoke the awe and wonder of Estas Tonne's music and the storytelling brilliance of games like Journey.


🔊 Crystal-Clear Audio: Elevate your game's audio quality to new heights, delivering an unforgettable experience to players.


🎮 Game Enhancement: Take your game projects to the next level by infusing them with the power of ambient music, creating unforgettable player experiences.


🌐 Explore Now: The meditative music asset seamlessly integrates into your games, enhancing the overall experience and immersing players in a world of emotion and wonder. Elevate your games with the transformative power of immersive music
technicalDetails:
• Preview: https://youtu.be/MoCGUtmpHtg
  • 15 Tracks: A collection of 15 expertly crafted music pieces.
  • High-Quality: 44.1kHz, 16-bit audio for exceptional sound clarity.
  • Formats: Available in both WAV and OGG formats.
  • Loopable: Includes loopable versions for seamless integration.


Number of Audio Wavs: 23

Number of Audio Cues: 23

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 30m

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://mnervastudios.wixsite.com/mnerva
